levels.name: Cosmic Encounter
levels.description: Dive into the game with this easy and enjoyable level designed to introduce players to the gameplay mechanics and controls.
levels.objective: Defeat all of the aliens before they reach the bottom of the screen

levels.name: Rookie Raid
levels.description: Engage in a beginner-friendly invasion scenario, where the number of enemy ships is limited, providing a gentler challenge for novice players
levels.objective: Defeat all of the aliens before they reach the bottom of the screen

levels.name: Bullet Blitz
levels.description: The aliens have invaded Earth! The player must defend the planet from the alien invaders
levels.objective: Defeat all of the alien ships before they destroy the Ship

levels.name: The Learning Curve
levels.description: Investigate and neutralize anomalies scattered across space, which pose a threat to your home planet
levels.objective: Defeat the enemy squadron while minimizing damage to the peaceful nebula
